Uses of Interface
smile.math.DifferentiableMultivariateFunction

  • Packages that use DifferentiableMultivariateFunction 
    Package Description
    smile.math
    Basic mathematical functions, complex, differentiable function interfaces, random number generators, unconstrained optimization, and raw data type (int and double) array lists, etc.

    • Uses of DifferentiableMultivariateFunction in smile.math

      Classes in smile.math that implement DifferentiableMultivariateFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDifferentiableMultivariateFunction
      An abstract implementation that uses finite differences to calculate the partial derivatives instead of providing them analytically.
